thread.title: Top Trump aide Hope Hicks to leave White House

title: Top Trump aide Hope Hicks to leave White House
text:
Top Trump aide Hope Hicks to leave White House Wednesday, February 28, 2018 - 01:43 
Hope Hicks, one of U.S. President Donald Trump’s longest-serving aides, is resigning from her job as White House communications director, White House spokeswoman Sarah Sanders said on Wednesday. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Hope Hicks, one of U.S. President Donald Trump’s longest-serving aides, is resigning from her job as White House communications director, White House spokeswoman Sarah Sanders said on Wednesday.
